title: Under the Devil’s Breath - Novel Updates
tags: Angels   Betrayal   Demons   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Male Yandere   Royalty   Time Loop
author: Yeon Seori   연서리
description:
The Princess, Hyyan was about to get married to the one she loved.

From what day did she get betrayed by her lover…?
She had a bizarre dream of being killed.

After meeting her first death like that, waking up from the dream and feeling relieved for a while,
Hyyan died again.

A dream that she never wakes up from even if she died and died again.
She earnestly prayed to wake up from her dream.

‘Anyone is fine, please let me out of this pain…
Please end this dream, please.’

The devil, Darius, appeared in front of her.
But, the devil made an incomprehensible demand to her…

“Try to love me. If you fall in love with me, I’ll let you out of this dream.”

Hyyan was trapped in a repeating dream.

What will be the end of her dream…?>
